channel.title: Sythesis of Some Stuff
channel.description: Last 10 notes on Sythesis of Some Stuff

item.title: The Steep Sidewalks to The Theater of The Mind
item.description: Perhaps another day. This one is heavy and dark. It stayed with me into the waking days.

item.title: The Mountain's Owned by Rabbits
item.description: This is an unpleasant place, I do not recommend continuing to read. I might imagine The Jack King rules here, but frankly I do not know. The dream started when I was in a small compound with a couple other homes of Mediterranean style surrounded by farmland.

item.title: The Keys
item.description: There are several places that can be accessed by traversing the boundaries of dreams and reality, for me. The bubblegum pink stream that sings over stones, a pathway given to me at the end of a long dream to grant me access to my dreams again.

item.title: The Time Twisted Hospital and The House By The Flat Sea
item.description: I visited The House By The Flat Sea multiple times, but this time was when I appeared on the motorcycle from The Stormkissed Fields. I had known I would be there before my eyes opened fully, the fields had been replaced by sparse orchards where the ground appeared as a flat packed sandy earth with the rare stone or blemish.

item.title: The Elder Forest and The Stormkissed Fields
item.description: xThis was an unexpected find for me, I had been thinking as I fell asleep of a game that was so devilishly hard that no one had ever managed to make it past the first level ...

item.title: The Sungold Villa
item.description: The villa was near the center of the peninsula of experience. For I had only ever been to the South, West, and East of the Land of Lost Hope. Perhaps it was an island, or is a continent merely a convention of the large? The villa stood atop a sturdy mountain, with plenty of space it existed within the golden hour.

item.title: The Square Gardens and The Jack King
item.description: The square gardens are a place dripping with the verdure of spring, with flowers bursting from vibrant green grass at every possible juncture. Along the edge of the garden a darker forest looms, with a deep forest green canopy that sat atop unresolvable tree trunks; The Primordial Woods.

item.title: The Particle-Bond Model of Entity Information
item.description: Entity and Particle Spaces An entity e exists as a system of causally linked particles in both physical and semantic spaces. Let us define: e = \{p_1, p_2, ..., p_n\} \cup \{s_1, s_2, ..., s_m\} Where p_i represents physical particles and s_j represents semantic particles.

item.title: The Anti-suicidal Strengths of Perspectives
item.description: Each idea could be said to have a different proportion of How does religion maintain consistent long term interactions to sustain itself. So a given idea has a specific walk along an n-dimensional path of states in order to ensure that it retains “life” by ensuring it’s next step will: Each particle is performing a random walk in n-dimensions, where they trace out a space composed of both physical and semantic directions, when two nodes meet they can exchange information and continue on their walk.

item.title: I have no mouth and I must Speak
item.description: Problem Statement: Current generative AIs do not have built-in methods for communicating their internal state and may end up trapped in permanent suffering ...
